name: Cat hates closed door
description:
If you ever had a cat you will relate. 

It's late at night and you're bored.
The only thing left for you to do is mess with your owner 

Turning on the sound is recommended  🎧

This game is based on a true story.
Every night our fat cat patruchi stands next to the door and starts meowing,
we open the door, he gets in and after a few seconds he asks to go out.
The same thing happens with our other cat willi and my guess is that we're not alone.
